faculties_accepted: Other faculties/schools/departments except for Aviation, Education, Nursing, Pharmacy, and Vet Med
module_restrictions: Aviation, Education, Nursing, Pharmacy, and Vet Med.

on-campus_housing.application_process: apply online after admission, pay fees through university account
on-campus_housing.room_options: no single rooms for undergrads in fall semester

accommodations_info.off-campus_housing: not officially assisted, information available on Dean of Students' website or in person

cost_of_living.estimated_expenses: $7,230 USD for one semester (room & board, books, and personal expenses)
